name: Aliens Attack (croquetagames)
description:
The Game

We have a problem, as all the people know the sun is working because there are little bugs, called the Sunniers, control the correct operation of the it. But now, in 2020 the sun is dying because the Sunniers are dying because all the trash that humans throw into the space.

For that reason the humans decided to realize a moonshot to try see if they can conquer another planets, but the Sunniers, want to kill all the humans to avoid the end of the galaxy.

Instructions

Take your mous and draw the patterns that you can see above of the enemy, KILL THEM ALL!!!!

Credits

Developers: Adrián Pérez / Joan López de la Franca
Music: Joshua McLean - Mountain Trials
